welcome.title:
Your Goals, Our Knowledge 
-
 Your Success
welcome.subTitle: Discover the Potential, Ignite the Success with Our Invoicing Application!
welcome.offerParam: Create invoices, control your inventory, and manage your business, all in one place!
welcome.offerParamFirst: Our application allows users to quickly and easily create proforma invoices and commercial quotes. This enables users to save time and focus on other important business tasks. The application allows for adding customers, creating invoice and quote templates, and automatic calculation of amounts, taxes, and discounts.
welcome.offerParamSecond: Our application also provides tools for inventory management and monitoring stock levels. This allows users to quickly check stock status, add and remove products, and create reports related to their inventory. The application also enables the creation of orders and tracking their status.
welcome.offerParamThird: Our application provides secure user login and data storage. All data is stored in the cloud, allowing users to access it from anywhere in the world.
welcome.userParam: Join our satisfied customers and try Fakturio today!
welcome.userOpinionFirst: Our company has been using CompanyCompanion for several months, and we are very satisfied. Invoicing is now much easier and faster, and inventory control has never been so straightforward. We highly recommend it!
welcome.userOpinionSecond: CompanyCompanion has helped us streamline our operations from day one. The invoicing process has become easier, and inventory management is now more efficient. We recommend this application to every entrepreneur.
welcome.aboutUsParam: We are a team of experienced specialists creating simple tools for small businesses. Our mission is to simplify the management of invoices, quotes, and inventory. CompanyCompanion is a solution designed for small business owners to make their work efficient and enjoyable.
welcome.contactParam: If you have anything in mind just contact us with our expert.

about.title: WHO WE ARE
about.subTitle: We are an easy-to-use application designed to help small businesses manage their daily operations with ease. With an intuitive interface and versatile features.
about.ourAppDescription: Our Application - Your Key to Faster and Easier Management of Invoices, Inventory, and Clients.

home.invoiceSubTitle: Set the terms of sale before the actual invoice. Issue proformas, enter order details and automatically calculate the amount.
home.proformaSubTitle: Issue invoices the easy way. Connect with customers, calculate taxes and generate invoice numbers - all in one place.
home.productSubTitle: Add products easily and always be prepared for invoicing. Create a product catalog with names, descriptions and prices, then add them to invoices in seconds.
home.customerSubTitle: Manage your customers' data in one place. Add and edit their contact information, addresses and payment information. Issue invoices and proformas with auto-filled customer data and save time.
home.employeeSubTitle: Add and manage your employees' data in one place. Save time and easily assign employees to invoices.
home.reviewSubTitle: Easily control the status of your invoices with a clear summary. See how many invoices have already been paid and how many are still outstanding. View a list of all invoices and their statuses to always have an overview.
home.dashboardSubTitle: A clear control panel where you will find a summary of your most important business activities. Quickly and easily check the status of your invoices, proformas, and current balance.
